Text:
I just started listening to this compilation and I must say that I enjoy it!  My wife grew up in China and didn't get much exposure to music outside of China during the 80-90's... she is going to go crazy for this mix.  Keep it coming.  

I am looking forward to the next iteration. Thanks!
How did you find "See You in Vegas"?  Do they have any other offerings comparable to "Work"?  I love the guitar work and echo in this track.

nonsentence, I am glad someone liked this at least. was getting disappointed that thought noone likes MOD and punk stuff on tpb. See You In Vegas song comes off their 7'' "The Day The World Caught Fire", other songs are ok but nothing special.
I had never seen this comp from you, and I'm thrilled to get it.  Vol 2, please!
THX for your love of keeping sounds alive. These will last for years. I played in the late 80`s a modern rock band. Did not go to far but it was fun.
